negativeReply.message: Hi, this is Sofia Hernandez. That’s not the issue here. There’s no indication that the problem involves musty smells, damp air, or blackish-green stains. Take a closer look at the details—maybe the signs point to something else entirely. Keep trying!

calls.message: Hi, my name is Sofia Hernandez. I'm calling because there's a strong musty smell in my bathroom and some blackish-green stains appearing on the walls and ceiling. The paint is bubbling, and I feel the air is damp in that area. I’m worried this might affect my health. Could you guide me on what steps to take?

negativeReply.message: Hi, this is Ricardo Lopez. That’s not quite right. There’s no sign of small, fast movements or food scraps with holes in this case. Perhaps the issue lies elsewhere—take a closer look at the details and try again!

calls.message: Hi, I'm Ricardo Lopez, and I wanted to report something strange that I've noticed in my house. Every time I turn on the kitchen light at night, I see something small and fast running towards the corners or under the sink. I have also found food scraps with small holes and an unpleasant smell near the garbage disposal. I don't know how to get rid of them, and they seem to be increasing. I hope you can help me. Thank you.

negativeReply.message: Hi, this is Clara Martinez. That doesn’t seem to be the issue. There’s no mention of hollow wood, tiny tunnels, or small winged insects in this case. Maybe the problem is related to something else. Take another look and try again!

calls.message: Hi, I'm Clara Martinez. I'm concerned because I discovered small specks of dust near my door and window frames. Upon closer inspection, I noticed that the wood looks like it is hollow in some places, and there are some tiny tunnels in the walls. I also saw small winged insects near the lights a couple of days ago. Please, I need guidance to resolve this before it gets worse.
